org.ljtoolkit.services
Interface ILiveJournalService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LiveJournalService
public interface ILiveJournalService

This interface represents an aggregation of the various Live Journal service protocols. The protocols represented are:

  • getchallenge
  • login
  • checkfriends
  • getfriends
  • getfriendgroups
  • friendof
  • editfriends
  • editfriendgroups
  • getdaycounts
  • getevents
  • editevent

Author:
Troy Bourdon
